song.englishname: I Just Want To Be Where You Are

english.verse1: I just want to be where You are, dwelling daily in Your presence I don't want to worship from afar, draw me near to where You are
english.verse2: I just want to be where You are, in Your dwelling place forever. Take me to the place where You are, I just want to be with You.
english.verse3: I just want to be where You are, to enter boldly in Your presence. I don't want to worship from afar, draw me near to where You are.
english.coda: Oh, my God, You are my strength and my song. And when I'm in Your presence. Though I'm weak You're always strong.
english.chorus: I want to be where You are, dwelling in Your presence. Feasting at Your table, surrounded by Your glory. In Your presence, that's where I always want to be. I just want to be, I just want to be with You.
english.ending: I just want to be. I just want to be with You.
